The approach Iâ€™ve taken in my 4yr relationship is the Buddhist philosophy of â€œlove without attachmentâ€. I love my partner & he loves me but we have the understanding that neither of us owns each other & what each of us needs & chooses in life is up to ourselves to fulfill but with the support of the other.
Itâ€™s a struggle at times bc I know I can be very codependent one moment & then off with no word doing my own thing the next. He listens without judgement & responds if I need him. I donâ€™t expect him to read my mind or be a knight in shining armour. Tbh if anyone is going to be my knight in shining armour itâ€™s me
